ygData.subject: Hail fellow tinkerers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Just found out about this list not too long ago hehe.  Some of you might already know me, I have a tinkering guide web page that I try to update frequently.
ygData.messageBody:
Just found out about this list not too long ago hehe. Some of you might
already know me, I have a tinkering guide web page that I try to update
frequently. If you haven't taken a look yet, it has basically a lot of
spoiler type info on what works and what doesn't, as well a bunch of
general info on the skill and items. Anyway, just saying 'Hail', and best
of luck not getting the dreaded red text when tinkering :)

-Luke

EQ tinkering guide:
http://home1.gte.net/jlukas/eq/tinker.htm
